title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1490/97 of 29 July 1997 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3846/87 establishing an agricultural product nomenclature for export refunds
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1490/97 of 29 July 1997 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3846/87 establishing an agricultural product nomenclature for export refunds
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Sector 9 of the Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 3846/87, the information on CN codes ex 0406 10 20, ex 0406 90 31, ex 0406 90 33, ex 0406 90 73, ex 0406 90 76, ex 0406 90 81 and ex 0406 90 87 is replaced by the information in the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 July 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
